pullrequest.title: Add option in gui.ini to disable the use of spacenav

content.raw:
@azeey Thanks for the pull request! It looks good to me.

The branch `default` is the next major version of gazebo, which won't be released for a while. If you retarget this pull request to the branch `gazebo7` it will get released into gazebo 7 and 8 much sooner.

To people from the future: add this to `~/.gazebo/gui.ini` to disable spacenav.

```
[spacenav]
enable=false
```
